answerText: bauxite [10] The Bayer process is implemented primarily to extract this oxide, which then can be purified into its namesake metal.
heading: ACF Winter |2009 | University of Illinois A and Missouri State A and University of South Carolina A | 14 | Science | Chemistry | College
subject: Science
question: Question: The majority of this common Australian export is used as a feedstock in the Bayer process, which leaches one of its most important chemical components using heated sodium hydroxide solution.  [10] Name this heterogeneous ore is typically composed of gibbsite, boehmite, and diapsore.
